snippet: Though known as a low-key and unassuming lawmaker, Mr. Payne nonetheless made a mark in a number of areas, including education and global affairs.
abstract: Donald M Payne, former chairman of the Congressional Black Caucus who achieved the long-held goal of becoming the first black congressman from New Jersey, dies at age 77.
lead_paragraph: Though known as a low-key and unassuming lawmaker, Mr. Payne nonetheless made a mark in a number of areas, including education and global affairs.

headline.seo: Donald M. Payne, First Black Candidate Elected to Congress From New Jersey, Dies at 77
headline.main: Donald M. Payne, First Black Elected to Congress From New Jersey, Dies at 77
headline.print_headline: Donald Payne, Congressman From New Jersey, Dies at 77
